text: 18|56|Ara amara sudhu susambadadata o satarkakarirupe'i rasuladerake pathiye thaki, kintu kapherara batila dbara tarka kare, yate tara madhyame satyake byartha kare dite pare. Ara tara amara nidarsanabali o ya dbara taderake satarka kara hayeche sesabake bidrupera bisayarupe grahana kare thake.
